attributes.action: Get rid of homework. 93-99% of people in finland graduate
attributes.additional_details: I speak upon every teen when i say the government needs to stop schools giving homework.
attributes.background: 93-99% of people graduate in Finland with only 5 hours a day and a 1 hour break every single day with absolutely no homework which goes to show that homework is one of the causes of a broken education system. Also if you do your research you will find homework was intended as a punishment.
